1393830.name: INFLUXIS
1393830.description:
Years after the revolutionary Icarus mission set out to investigate planet Eo-III and its unknown alien life, Andrew and his AI companion EVE venture onto the planet, in search for answers as to what happened to the crew of Icarus.
His journey is however, not without perils and unexpected turn of events.

The game currently includes features such as:
- Resource gathering and crafting, while exploring alive and colourful biomes
- Survival management by managing hunger and oxygen levels, as well as by fending off aggressive fauna
- Blueprint based crafting progression
- Vehicle creation and control as well as base building
1393830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
